name: Spider Summoner
prerequisiteFormula: (@ability:summon_monster#unchained_summoner OR (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)) AND @race:drow
descriptionText: You gain the ability to summon powerful spiders.
